snippet: Mr. Joy was a lawyer with the Legal Aid Society who later led New York’s federal public defender’s office for more than two decades.
abstract: Leonard F Joy, longtime New York public defender, dies at age 81.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Joy was a lawyer with the Legal Aid Society who later led New York’s federal public defender’s office for more than two decades.

headline.seo: Leonard Joy, 81, Longtime Public Defender, Dies
headline.main: Leonard Joy, 81, Longtime Public Defender, Dies
headline.print_headline: Leonard Joy, 81, Longtime U.S. Public Defender in New York
